name: MJPWealthAdvisors
0:
”Alexa, ask m.j.p. wealth about the services”
”Alexa, ask m.j.p. wealth about what's new”
”Alexa, ask m.j.p. wealth to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: m. j. p. wealth
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Everyone has different financial needs, and those needs change over time. Whether you are planning for your children’s college and your own retirement, building a diversified portfolio to manage assets, or navigating a complex estate plan, MJP Wealth Advisors offers the perfect balance of sophisticated financial solutions and personal attention to meet those needs.

Hear about investing, financial planning, and market insights from MJP Wealth Advisors. 

Enable this skill then say, "Alexa, open MJP Wealth."

More that you can ask:

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about the services."
"Tell me about the team."
"Tell me about what's new."
"Tell me about media and events."

Learn more: mjpwealthadvisors.com

Follow us: 
Twitter: @MJPWealthAdv
LinkedIn: MJP Wealth Advisors

Request a demo to launch your own custom Alexa skill at WealthVoice.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
